name: giv
description: Social app designed to improve foot traffic to local charities

scripts.develop: concurrently "cd server && npm run watch" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i
scripts.build: cd client && npm install --only=dev && npm install && npm run build

author: Jesse Lemieux, Nick Melanson, Erica Trenholm, Matt Noreika
